title: Data-Driven Personalized E-Learning Feedback Design for Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Work experience in social fields and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Need for Real-Time Feedback Emphasizing Workplace Applicability for Practicing Professionals, Microlearning Environment via Digital Devices (Smartphones/Tablets)

learning_goals: Analyze learning behavior data to design three or more feedback strategies tailored to learner types
Operate a system that classifies real-time learner behavior patterns in mobile environments with over 65% accuracy
Conceptualize feedback loops based on knowledge acquisition, learning experience, and social presence metrics
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
